messages.message: I think this is a silly question, but none of our containers run any `pip installs` at runtime, correct? Capital One is saying their security team is detecting calls doing through their proxy server that are not approved, just want to confirm that we are not doing this.
jw, what release are they on? afaik we shouldn’t be doing this anywhere unless they have a udf that’s trying to do this on their end.
@Yash Botadra @Yiqing would you be able to confirm if any of the model-training flow or model-service would pip installs at runtime, anything happening in ibformers?
Hmm, this is an old and stable version. Can they provide the package metadata so we can locate/investigate the possible service?
I’ll try to get more info but I told them I’m pretty certain we don’t do an pip installs at runtime
